name: recTANGLE
description:
This is a student project by team Mountain Fish Studios in the University of Utah's Entertainment Arts and Engineering(EAE) program. It was built using GameMaker Studio.

recTANGLE is a minimalist platformer with simple controls and finely tuned movement. You are a square making your way through the TANGLE to the city at the center. Along your way, you will encounter a diverse landscape of rectangles with a variety of personalities. Can you navigate through the dangers the TANGLE holds to reach the center?

The team:

  • Duncan Cox: Team Lead, Producer, Designer
  • Kyle Erickson: Lead Engineer, Designer
  • Liu Jiling: Artist
  • Kyle Pharo: Artist
  • Chase Sanders: Lead Artist, Designer
  • Fabio Xavier: Technical Artist
